name: Flying Tickets
storyline:
For the past few years, the world has been caught up inside of “Flappy” mania. This simple style of play is based on single button operation where a character (usually a bird) will ‘flap’ at a button press. Obstacles with a gap in-between them scroll in from the right side of the screen and the challenge is to survive through as many gaps as possible.

Adrenaline Amusements has taken this idea a step further with their new Flying Tickets video redemption game. where games Massive and fun new video game with ticket redemption feature included from Adrenaline Amusements, where players fly through various obstacles and try to win a ton of tickets. What makes this better than the original concept is that it includes 2-player competitive play!
summary: Flying Tickets is a video game with ticket redemption feature included. Players fly through various obstacles and try to win tickets.
